```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.rc('figure',figsize=(16,4))
plt.rc('font',size=12)
plt.rc('text',usetex=False)
plt.rc('image', cmap='viridis')
import numpy as np
```

```{python}
#### This is the analytical synthesized for a pixel at the focal plane center 
#### without accounting for the primry beam (just the mukltple peaks)
def sb_noprim(th_deg, nu):
    th = np.radians(th_deg)
    lam = 3e8/nu
    P = 20
    deltax = 0.013
    df = 300.
    abscissa = np.pi * deltax/lam * th
    sb = np.sin(P*abscissa)**2 / np.sin(abscissa)**2
    return sb/np.max(sb)
```

```{python}
## With Multiband = False  => using a QubicInstrument
import qubic
import os

d = qubic.qubicdict.qubicDict()
d.read_from_file(os.environ['QUBIC_DICT']+'global_source_oneDet.dict')
d['multiband'] = False
d['beam_shape'] = 'fitted_beam'   # fitted_beam, gaussian, multi_freq
#print('Beam Shape:',d['beam_shape'])


freqs = np.array([1.32638868e+11, 1.50398340e+11, 1.67001321e+11])
nn = 1000
th= np.linspace(-30,30, nn)
ph = 0

plt.figure(figsize=(12,10))
for j, ibeam in enumerate(['fitted_beam', 'gaussian', 'multi_freq']):
    print('Computing beam model: {}'.format(ibeam))
    allbeams = np.zeros((len(freqs), nn))
    d['beam_shape'] = ibeam
    for i in range(len(freqs)):
        plt.subplot(3,2,2*j+1)
        d['filter_nu'] = freqs[i]
        q = qubic.QubicInstrument(d)
        allbeams[i,:] = q.primary_beam(np.radians(np.abs(th)),ph)

        p=plt.plot(th, allbeams[i,:],'--', label='nu={0:6.1f}'.format(freqs[i]/1e9))
        plt.plot(th, allbeams[i,:]*sb_noprim(th, freqs[i]), color=p[0].get_color())
        plt.title(ibeam)#'d[beam_shape]='+d['beam_shape']+' , Multiband='+str(d['multiband']))
        plt.subplot(3,2,2*j+2)
        plt.xlim(-12,-7)
        mask=np.where((th<-7) & (th>-9))
        if i == 2: plt.axhline(np.max(allbeams[i,mask]*sb_noprim(th[mask], freqs[i])), c='g' )
        p=plt.plot(th, allbeams[i,:],'--', label='nu={0:6.1f}'.format(freqs[i]/1e9))
        plt.plot(th, allbeams[i,:]*sb_noprim(th, freqs[i]), color=p[0].get_color())
        plt.title(ibeam)#'d[beam_shape]='+d['beam_shape']+' , Multiband='+str(d['multiband']))

        plt.legend()
    plt.grid()
```

```{python}
    yscale('log')

legend()
```
